# File test/ext_ind_test.rb, line 1239
  def test_each
    # Changes: cannot take strings, 

    # replace (ant bat cat dog) with [1,2,3,4]

    
    #a = @cls[*%w( ant bat cat dog )]

    a = @cls[*(1..4).to_a]
    i = 0
    a.each { |e|
      assert_equal(a[i], e)
      i += 1
    }
    assert_equal(4, i)

    a = @cls[]
    i = 0
    a.each { |e|
      assert_equal(a[i], e)
      i += 1
    }
    assert_equal(0, i)

    assert_equal(a, a.each {})
  end
